Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Purely \Pure"ly\, adv. 1. In a pure manner (in any sense of the adjective). [1913 Webster]
2. Nicely; prettily. [Archaic] --Halliwell. [1913 Webster]
purely adv : restricted to something; "we talked strictly business" [syn: {strictly}]
